column2: The proclamation An Mein Volk was issued by King Frederick William III of Prussia on 17 March 1813 in Breslau, to adress his subjects for the fight against the french occopuier. With the Unification of all Prussians and Germans, Napoleon was finally defeated at the Battle of Leipzig, also known as the Battle of Nations. Never again we will accept the french subjugation and never before was Germany defeated when it was united. Pro gloria et patria!
